pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared client_id = "fe78c0c5-78b7-4b26-b890-4ca1e149a074" meta [IsParameterQuery=true, Type="Any", IsParameterQueryRequired=true];
shared client_secret = "xtw8Q~.xSg7yvXMsmHADNwEZgnEezNi6YqTLwaBP" meta [IsParameterQuery=true, Type="Any", IsParameterQueryRequired=true];
shared tenant_id = "4510a959-aa93-4f35-a3f5-e2249f4d35f6" meta [IsParameterQuery=true, Type="Any", IsParameterQueryRequired=true];
shared GetToken = let
    Source = () =>
let
    body = "grant_type=client_credentials&resource=https://analysis.windows.net/powerbi/api&client_id="&client_id&"&client_secret="&client_secret,
    Data=Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://login.microsoftonline.com/"&tenant_id&"/oauth2/token", [Headers=[#"Content-Type"="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"], Content=Text.ToBinary(body)])),
    access_token = Data[access_token]
in
    access_token
in
    Source;
shared wsbody = let
  JSV = Json.FromValue([workspaces = #"Column1 id"]),
  JSONToTextOne = Table.FromColumns({Lines.FromBinary(JSV, null, null, 1252)}),
  TextOnly = JSONToTextOne{0}[Column1]
in
  TextOnly;
shared getScanID = let

    Data = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/",
    [
        RelativePath= "admin/workspaces/modified?excludePersonalWorkspaces=True",
    
    
     

       Headers=[Authorization="Bearer " & GetToken()]
    ]
    )),
    #"Converted to Table" = Table.FromList(Data, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
    exo = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to Table", "Column1", {"id"}, {"Column1.id"}),
        PostWSContent = Web.Contents("https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/admin/workspaces/getInfo?lineage=True&datasourceDetails=True&datasetSchema=true&datasetExpressions=true&getArtifactUsers=true",
    [
        
       Headers=[Authorization="Bearer " & GetToken(),
       #"Content-Type"="application/json"
       ],
       Content =  Text.ToBinary(wsbody)]),

    #"Renamed Columns" = Table.RenameColumns(exo,{{"Column1.id", "workspaceID"}}),
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Renamed Columns",{{"workspaceID", type text}}),
    exoN = Table.AddColumn( #"Changed Type", "NN", each Json.Document(PostWSContent))
in
    exoN;
shared #"Column1 id" = let

    Data = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/",
    [
        RelativePath= "admin/workspaces/modified?excludePersonalWorkspaces=True",
    
    
     

       Headers=[Authorization="Bearer " & GetToken()]
    ]
    )),
    #"Converted to Table" = Table.FromList(Data, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
    #"Expanded Column1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to Table", "Column1", {"id"}, {"Column1.id"}),
    #"Column1 id1" = #"Expanded Column1"[Column1.id]
in
    #"Column1 id1";
shared WorkspaceList = let

    Data = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/",
    [
        RelativePath= "admin/workspaces/modified?excludePersonalWorkspaces=True",
    
    
     

       Headers=[Authorization="Bearer " & GetToken()]
    ]
    )),
    #"Converted to Table" = Table.FromList(Data, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
    exo = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to Table", "Column1", {"id"}, {"Column1.id"}),
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(exo,{{"Column1.id", type text}})
in
    #"Changed Type";
shared scanResults = let
  Data = getScanID[NN],
  Data1 = Data{0},
  #"Converted to Table" = Record.ToTable(Data1),
  #"Transform columns" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Converted to Table", {{"Value", type text}}),
  #"Replace errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Transform columns", {{"Value", null}})
in
  #"Replace errors";
shared getScanIDWS = let
    Source = getScanID,
    #"Expanded NN" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(Source, "NN", {"id", "createdDateTime", "status"}, {"id", "createdDateTime", "status"}),
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded NN",{{"id", type text}, {"createdDateTime", type datetime}, {"status", type text}})
in
    #"Changed Type";
